data.lyric:
[ti:Our Summer(Christmas Tree) (试听版) (《那年，我们的夏天》韩剧插曲)]
[ar:V (뷔)]
[al:그 해 우리는 OST Part.5 (那年，我们的夏天 OST Part.5)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.44]Our Summer(Christmas Tree) (试听版) - V (뷔)
[00:06.25]In this moment
[00:09.22]
[00:09.91]I see you
[00:12.34]
[00:13.28]It always comes around
[00:15.47]As I believed
[00:17.40]
[00:19.95]When the rain stops
[00:22.56]
[00:23.62]You shine on me
[00:26.15]
[00:26.93]Your light's the only thing
[00:29.25]That keeps the cold out
[00:31.79]
[00:33.25]Moon in the summer night
[00:36.66]Whispering of the stars
[00:39.98]They're singing like
[00:41.41]Christmas trees for us
[00:44.85]
[00:46.89]So I'll tell you
[00:49.48]A million tiny things that
[00:52.95]You have never known
[00:56.18]
[00:56.74]It all gets tangled up inside
[01:00.61]And I'll tell you
[01:03.16]A million little reasons
[01:06.65]I'm falling for your eyes
[01:09.32]
[01:10.42]I just want to be where you are
[01:15.09]
[01:15.88]It's such a strange thing to do
[01:19.37]Sometimes I don't understand you
[01:22.87]But it always brings me back
[01:25.83]
[01:27.44]To where you are
